conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a artificial intelligence movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I think I have just the right recommendations for you!

If you're looking for a classic in the artificial intelligence genre, I highly recommend "Blade Runner" (1982). This iconic sci-fi film explores the themes of humanity and what it means to be alive through its portrayal of advanced androids known as replicants. With Harrison Ford leading the cast, this movie is a must-see for anyone interested in AI.

If you'd like something a bit more recent and family-friendly, I suggest "A.I. Artificial Intelligence" (2001). This beautifully crafted film tells the story of David, a highly advanced robot boy who wants to become human. With Haley Joel Osment's endearing performance as David, this movie is sure to tug at your heartstrings.

Which one catches your eye?

The film's unique premise, featuring zombies created by an experimental bio-weapon, is sure to grab your attention. Plus, the cast is stacked with familiar faces like Josh Brolin and Robert Rodriguez himself makes an appearance.
